A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The characters are poorly handled\, the casino subplot and everyone involved was a waste of time\, any tantalizing mystery from TFA is killed off for no apparent reason other than for Rian Johnson to say “Whoa\, bet you never saw this coming! I’m so edgy and unpredictable!” A lot of bad things can be said about this movie-at least the visuals were gorgeous and the score was beautifully handled by John Williams per usual.
